typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		statecode as string,
		ntt_activeregister as string,
		statuscode as string,
		ntt_addresswithheld as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_mobiletelephone as string,
		ntt_reference as string,
		ntt_breathingspacedebtorid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		ntt_telephone as string,
		ntt_lastname as string,
		timezoneruleversionnumber as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		ntt_email as string,
		ntt_dateofbirth as string,
		createdby as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		ntt_middlename as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		owninguser as string,
		ntt_firstname as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceStaging
sourceStaging derive(tsCreatedOn = toTimestamp(createdon),
		tsModifiedOn = toTimestamp(modifiedon),
		tsNTTDateOfBirth = toTimestamp(ntt_dateofbirth),
		strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId = toString(ntt_breathingspacedebtorid),
		blNTTAddressWithheld = toBoolean(ntt_addresswithheld)) ~> decolTypeConvertion
decolTypeConvertion derive(blIsValid = iif(isNull(tsCreatedOn) || isNull(tsModifiedOn) || isNull(tsNTTDateOfBirth) || isNull(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId) || isNull(blNTTAddressWithheld) || tsNTTDateOfBirth > tsModifiedOn || tsNTTDateOfBirth < toTimestamp('1830-01-01 00:00:00'), toBoolean('0'), toBoolean('1'))) ~> dcolIsValid
dcolIsValid derive(tsCreatedOn = coalesce(tsCreatedOn, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		tsModifiedOn = coalesce(tsModifiedOn, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		tsNTTDateOfBirth = coalesce(tsNTTDateOfBirth, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId = coalesce(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId,'missing'),
		blNTTAddressWithheld = coalesce(blNTTAddressWithheld, toBoolean('false'))) ~> dcolMandatoryValue
dcolMandatoryValue derive(blIsTruncate = iif(length(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId) > 36, toBoolean('1'), toBoolean('0'))) ~> dcolIsTruncate
dcolIsTruncate derive(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId = left(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId, 36)) ~> dcolMandatoryTruncate
dcolMandatoryTruncate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkValidation
